pkgmetadata.longdescription: Chic and Sleek Functions for Beautiful Statisticians // Because your linear models deserve better than console output. A sleek color palette and kable styling to make your regression results look sharper than they are. Includes support for Partial Least Squares (PLS) regression via both the SVD and NIPALS algorithms, along with a unified interface for model fitting and fabulous LaTeX and console output formatting. See the package manual at https://github.com/JesusButForGayPeople/snazz ieR/releases/download/v0.1.1/snazzieR_0.1.1.pdf.
